title: Rainy city driving, moderate speed, no significant braking
caption: The ego vehicle drives down a rainy city street at moderate speed, with no significant braking.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNoon). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.4 m/s). No significant braking is observed in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and there are several other cars on the street, some of which are driving at a faster speed. A red car is parked on the side of the road, and there is a traffic light visible in the distance. The weather is rainy, and the visibility is moderate. The ego vehicle is driving straight and maintaining a safe distance from the other cars on the road.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed because the road is wet from the rain, and it needs to maintain traction. It is also keeping a safe distance from the other cars on the road to avoid any potential accidents. The red car parked on the side of the road is not a significant obstacle, but the traffic light in the distance is an important reference point for the ego vehicle's navigation.
